Name: Crypt of the Serpent King
About the game: Crypt of the Serpent King is a medieval first-person hack'n'slash dungeon crawler with roguelike elements. Explore large, randomly generated dungeons . Fight goblins, orcs, skeletons, giant spiders and all sorts of underworld creatures . Wield an array of melee and ranged weapons . Jump over lava pits and spike traps . Level up your character's abilities . Choose between 3 levels of difficulty , from casual to hardcore.
